Sorcerer Bloodline

The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your family history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force.

Class Skill: Knowledge (planes).

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{Burning Hands}* (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q4ixxjb4v281g2xv]{Scorching Ray}* (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{Protection from Energy} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pawbnw1nm4f0b98e]{Elemental Body I} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{Elemental Body II} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{Elemental Body III} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{Elemental Body IV} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j91n23p4tfjixp3s]{Summon Monster VIII} (elementals only) (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pfy97qyneoa391ek]{Elemental Swarm} (19th).

*These spells always deal a type of damage determined by your element. In addition, the subtype of these spells changes to match the energy type of your element.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{Empower Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Knowledge [planes]),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{Weapon Finesse}.

Bloodline Arcana: Whenever you cast a spell that deals energy damage, you can change the type of damage to match the type of your bloodline. This also changes the spell’s type to match the type of your bloodline.
